scripts.dev: printf '\033[95mRunning application in development mode\033[0m' && echo ... && docker compose up --build
scripts.prod: printf '\033[95mRunning application in production mode\033[0m' && echo ... && docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml up --build
scripts.down: printf '\033[95mRemoving docker containers and volumes\033[0m' && echo ... && docker compose down -v
scripts.npm-refresh: printf '\033[95mReinstalling node_modules in backend\033[0m' && echo ... && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i && printf '\033[95mReinstalling node_modules in frontend\033[0m' && echo ... && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.npm-refresh-b: printf '\033[95mReinstalling node_modules in backend\033[0m' && echo ... && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.npm-refresh-f: printf '\033[95mReinstalling node_modules in frontend\033[0m' && echo ... && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.help: printf '\033[95mnpm run dev \033[0m' && echo - Start the application in development mode (Watches for changes to the code). && printf '\033[95mnpm run prod \033[0m' && echo - Start the application in production mode. && printf '\033[95mnpm run down \033[0m' && echo - Remove docker containers and volumes. && printf '\033[95mnpm run npm-refresh \033[0m' && echo - Reinstall frontend and backend node_modules. && printf '\033[95mnpm run npm-refresh-f \033[0m' && echo - Reinstall frontend node_modules. && printf '\033[95mnpm run npm-refresh-b \033[0m' && echo - Reinstall backend node_modules.
